abstract: Securities and Exchange Commission issues rules allowing small investors to buy shares of private companies through crowdfunding campaigns.
lead_paragraph: New rules allow small investors to receive shares of a company in exchange for investments they make.

headline.main: S.E.C. Gives Small Investors Access to Equity Crowdfunding
headline.print_headline: Small Investors Gain Access to Equity Crowdfunding

snippet: New rules allow small investors to receive shares of a company in exchange for investments they make.
